Program_Policies: To earn an undergraduate certificate in Development and Sustainability in Africa, a minimum of 12 credits is required.; Non-Course Requirements:; Per University policy, all credit courses for a certificate require a grade of 'C' or higher, and at least two-thirds (2/3) of the credits used to complete a certificate must be earned at Penn State.
